mapper.select: select productNum, count(*) ,productPrice, productName from( select productNum,MemOrderNum,productPrice,productName from simple.memberorder union select productNum,nonMemOrderNum,nonMemOrderSeqNum,productName from simple.nonmemberorder) as best group by productNum order by count(*)desc limit 3 ;

select p.productNum, productName, productPrice, productImage, count(f.productNum) as favoriteCount from simple.product as p left join simple.favoriteproduct as f on p.productNum=f.productNum where productName like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%') group by p.productNum ;

select p.productNum, productName, productPrice, productImage, count(f.productNum) as favoriteCount from simple.product as p left join simple.favoriteproduct as f on p.productNum=f.productNum where productName like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') group by p.productNum ;
